description:
The main protagonist of the series.
[spoiler="Spoiler"]His name, according to his parents, writing as "Hoshizawa", lit` "Starry Sky`` but read as Nasa. This makes his schoolmates made his name funny because they think he can become an astronaut (conflicted with National Aeronautics and Space Administration). Nasa is a smart and hard-working person. He follows Tsukasa on a snowy night after saw her in a bus station and end up almost got hit by a truck, but Tsukasa saved him. Nasa said he wants to go out with her, but Tsukasa said "Only if you married me." he agreed without any hesitation. A few years later, when Tsukasa appears in front of Nasa`s apartment, they fulfilled the marriage promise. [/spoiler]
name: Yuzaki Nasa
